content: ETF Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 07 Nov 2018How do I invest in VOO ETF? What is the cheapest and best platform to use? I intend to do a quarterly passive investment. Thanks ?1 answerAnswerBump0

Yixiong ChangLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 07 Nov 2018You just need any broker that can trade stocks on NYSE. Best platform will depend on u. Which broker do u trust. You can check out saxo capital markets. I find it quite ok. 1cents per share min US$3.99. Has a singapore office. Supports local funding methods. There are cheaper com broker that I use, but it will not be suitable for u. Since u are not an active trader.0 comments0
